markdown:
'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [book](/book/) in {{poe2}}.

##  Description 

{{Description |{{#var:description}}}}

##  Acquisition 

{{#arraymap: {{#var:location}}|;|x|x|\n}}

## Trivia

* Based on the dates, the expedition starts occurs approximately 18 days prior to the revival of the Watcher on ''[The Defiant](/theDefiant/)'', and the start of the game.
* The log is assumed to be written by [Falero](/falero/), one of the members of the expedition. It can be found on the body of Dueno - it assumed that he stole it from Falero.
* Other member of the party include:
** [Vektor](/vektor/), who was sick and decided not to continue to the ruins.
** [Beza](/beza/), leader of the expedition. You can talk to her soul on level four.
** [Gian](/gian/), he is killed by the Engwithan Titan outside.
** [Olara](/olara/), she is the first to enter the ruins after activating the titan. She is killed by a spike trap after being pushed by Dueno, on level one.
** [Dueno](/dueno/), killed by Beza on level two, found by Beza and Falero with a sword in his back.
** [Falero](/falero/), is killed by an Engwithan Saint on level three.
raw:
{{Infobox item poe2
| name           = Poko Kohara Expedition Log
| icon           = Poe2 poko kohara expedition log icon.png
| description    = This leather-bound logbook has "Property of the [[Vailian Trading Company]]" stamped inside its cover. Most of the pages are dark brown and stiff, stained with some dark, aromatic beverage.

A few pages have been ripped from the end.

"We set out at dawn on orders from [[Governor Alvari]]. She's heard rumor of luminous adra at a place called [[Poko Kohara]]. Unfortunately, the place is said to be surrounded by storms, and it doesn't appear on any of our charts, but we're told the locals at [[Tikawara]] may be able to help.

20 Préauton
I'd heard stories of bad run-ins with Huana tribes, but Chieftain [[Ranga Ruānu|Ruānu]] and the tribe at Tikawara welcomed us warmly. Fed us as well as could be expected and marked Poko Kohara on our maps. He seems to believe the storms are magical, or else the will of the gods. I hold out hope that they can be stopped.

2 Majauton
Left for Poko Kohara this morning. [[Vektor]] wasn't happy about being left behind, but he was too sick to travel and [[Beza]] was losing patience. Haven't seen a Rauataian ship since we left Neketaka, but she's still afraid they'll beat us there.

5 Majauton
Storms were some of the worst I've seen, but we made it. We set up camp by the cliffs, but we're all looking forward to getting into the ruins. At least it'll be dry in there.

7 Majauton
We lost [[Gian]] and [[Olara]] today. I don't know what, but something about this place seems off. The others feel it, too.

? Majauton
The murals here are incredible - proof that the Engwithans met ancient Huana two thousand years ago! That they might have even built this place! I keep trying to explain this to Beza, but she won't listen.

? Majauton
We found the top of the adra vein. It is glowing, but Beza says we have to go deeper."
| added_in       = poe2
| equipment_slot = Unequippable
| item_type      = Journal
| item_category  = Other item
| requirements   = 
| is_soulbound   = no
| is_unique      = no

| rel_abilities  =

| location       = * [[Engwithan Waystation Level Two]]: Found on the body of [[Dueno]].
}}

==Trivia==
* Based on the dates, the expedition starts occurs approximately 18 days prior to the revival of the Watcher on ''[[The Defiant]]'', and the start of the game.
* The log is assumed to be written by [[Falero]], one of the members of the expedition. It can be found on the body of Dueno - it assumed that he stole it from Falero.
* Other member of the party include:
** [[Vektor]], who was sick and decided not to continue to the ruins.
** [[Beza]], leader of the expedition. You can talk to her soul on level four.
** [[Gian]], he is killed by the Engwithan Titan outside.
** [[Olara]], she is the first to enter the ruins after activating the titan. She is killed by a spike trap after being pushed by Dueno, on level one.
** [[Dueno]], killed by Beza on level two, found by Beza and Falero with a sword in his back.
** [[Falero]], is killed by an Engwithan Saint on level three.
